name: fiufl

stmt.origin: sylbi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cufl), wcel(cpw(c0), cfn))
stmt.pretty: sylbi(c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ UFL, P(c0)∈ Fin)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cufl))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cpw(c0), cfn))
-| wi(wcel(cpw(c0), cfn), wcel(c0, cufl))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Fin → c0 ∈ UFL)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Fin ↔ P(c0)∈ Fin)
⊣ (P(c0)∈ Fin → c0 ∈ UFL)

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cfn), wcel(c0, cufl), wcel(cpw(cpw(c0)), cdm(ccrd)))

comment: A finite set satisfies the ultrafilter lemma. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
